review: Dr Shalini is super friendly and makes sure you are completely briefed on the root cause of the problem and the reasons for the symptoms you are displaying. She gave me a logical breakdown of the cleaning procedure and was thorough in her inspection and execution. A much better experience than any other dental chain; will definitely recommend for a holistic check up.
